casebody.data:
DAVIS
v.
CHEROKEE CASINO. No. 456A06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 30, 2006. Andrew S. Culicerto, Charlotte, for Casino, et al. D. Andrew Turman, for Davis.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 28th day of August 2006 by Defendants for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 30th day of August 2006."
